summary:
I am a highly skilled interdisciplinary professional with a Master's degree in Mining Engineering and Environment and Natural Resources, and a strong passion for sustainability. My career has provided me with extensive experience in management and consulting positions within the stone and aggregate industry, as well as academic research on sustainability and circular economy.

As an EU funding expert, I specialize in helping innovative projects in the fields of sustainability, energy transition, and circular economy successfully secure funding. I have supported several large-scale EU grant applications for the Innovation Fund and CEF in the fields of hydrogen and carbon capture and storage, utilizing my expertise in project management and grant writing. 

Moreover, I am the founder of Soypa, a sustainable skincare company that offers high-quality skin products powered by natural ingredients that are designed to nourish and protect the skin. Through Soypa, I have gained extensive experience in sustainable product development, marketing, and sales, with a focus on encouraging customers to adopt sustainable practices in their daily routines.
 
My analytical mindset has allowed me to quickly master new skills and techniques, enabling me to excel in my work environment. I enjoy collaborating with others to achieve common goals and continuously seek to expand my knowledge and skill set.

If you share a passion for sustainability and are interested in connecting, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to connecting with like-minded professionals and exploring new opportunities.

profile_positions.description:
Soypa is a handmade soap company based in The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands. Our products are made using high-quality plant-based ingredients and come in plastic-free packaging with a unique storytelling design.

As the founder of Soypa, I aim to offer skin products that not only nourish and protect the skin but also inspire customers to adopt sustainable lifestyle. Our scents and designs are inspired by places and experiences, adding an extra dimension to our products.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
I worked for a family-owned business that specialized in dimension stone production, as well as consulting services for dimension stone and aggregates production, and mining legislation in Croatia. In my role as a production manager, I was responsible for planning, organizing, and coordinating daily activities at the quarry. This involved overseeing an annual production of 1000m3 of dimension stone, and ensuring that all operations were carried out safely and efficiently. I also prepared quarry profiling reports and mining legislation documentation, and was responsible for managing business administration.

As a consultant, I participated in the quarry development and production process at the dimension limestone quarry. In addition, I prepared monthly drilling and blasting plans for an aggregate limestone quarry client. My expertise in documentation preparation was instrumental in obtaining two mining licenses for dimension stone quarries, which allowed the business to expand its operations and increase its revenue streams.

Throughout my work in both stone production and consulting, I was committed to ensuring a safe and productive work environment for all personnel and adhered to safety regulations and best practices to mitigate any potential hazards.
profile_positions.title: Quarry Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the team at the dimension limestone quarry, I played an integral role in the quarry's development and production. This included supporting the entire mining process, supervising the extraction of stone blocks, and customer service to our business partners and clients.
I worked closely with a team of professionals to ensure that all processes were carried out efficiently and safely. I developed an understanding of the quarry's development processes and geology, allowing me to make informed decisions on how to optimise stone production with minimal waste.

In addition to my technical skills, I also developed project management skills. I was responsible for coordinating the delivery of stone to our business partners in Asia, ensuring that shipments were made on time and in the correct quantities.
